about_the_game:
Demo for Skibi's Castle TD 2, a colorful, sticker-themed tower defense game developed by missing_tooltip, skotey, and catfan, the same team behind the original. Command Skibi's defenses and protect her castle from Rydik's invaders by summoning troops and purchasing new towers and upgrades.

Key Demo Features:
  • Challenging Puzzles: Engage in open-ended puzzles that reward strategic thinking and experimentation.
  • Strategic Depth: Replay stages to perfect your scores in time, cost, and distance to earn the game's most valuable currency, gold.
  • Indie Craftsmanship: Handcrafted by a passionate indie family company, ensuring a personal touch and a pinch of sarcasm.
  • Original Music: Get into the zen mode with original tunes by haishoe, featuring nostalgic themes to match the seasonal settings.
  • Leaderboards: Compete with friends on the leaderboards for biggest brain bragging rights.

Journey Before Destination - Our vision for Skibi's Castle TD 2 is to reimagine tower defense from the ground up, merging upfront auto-battler planning with puzzle-like levels. SK2 will evolve over time, just like the original (fun fact: the Blizzard version of the game was actually Skibi Castle TD 1 version 6).

Our next step is to listen to your feedback and expand upon the core puzzle gameplay. This could mean borrowing from roguelike and idle game systems, improving on the traditional survival mode, or introducing something new like a bullet hell tower defense RTS mission hybrid.
